mapper.select: SELECT l.`scholarship`, l.`recruit_type`, l.`std_stage`, u.`p_id`, l.`std_id`, s.`user_id`, l.is_online, l.grade, u.reg_time as create_time, l.enroll_channel, u.p_is_mb, s.std_name, s.mobile, s.id_card FROM bd_learn_info l LEFT JOIN bd_student_info s ON s.`std_id` = l.`std_id` LEFT JOIN us.us_base_info u on u.`std_id` = s.`std_id` WHERE l.`learn_id` = #{learnId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT s.std_name, s.mobile, s.id_card FROM bd_learn_info l LEFT JOIN bd_student_info s ON s.`std_id` = l.`std_id` WHERE l.`learn_id` = #{learnId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT l.`recruit_type` as recruitType, l.`std_stage` as stdStage, l.`grade` as grade, p.`pfsn_level` as pfsnLevel FROM bd_learn_info l left join bd_unvs_profession p on p.pfsn_id = l.pfsn_id where l.`std_id` = #{stdId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and l.`learn_id` != #{learnId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and l.std_stage in ('7','8','9','14')

SELECT r.`user_id` AS userId, r.`emp_id` AS empId, r.`p_id` AS pId, r.`p_is_mb` AS pIsMb FROM us.`us_base_info` r, bd_learn_info l where r.`std_id`=l.std_id and l.learn_id = #{learnId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT r.`recruit` AS empId, r.`recruit_dp_id` AS dpId, r.`recruit_campus_id` AS campusId, o.`mobile`, o.`std_id` as stdId FROM bd_learn_rules r INNER JOIN bd_student_order o ON o.`learn_id` = r.`learn_id` INNER JOIN bd_student_serial s ON s.`order_no` = o.`order_no` WHERE s.`serial_no` = #{serialNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT r.`recruit` AS empId, r.`recruit_dp_id` AS dpId, r.`recruit_campus_id` AS campusId, o.`mobile`, o.`std_id` AS stdId, e.`emp_status` AS empStatus FROM bd_learn_rules r INNER JOIN bd_student_order o ON o.`learn_id` = r.`learn_id` INNER JOIN bd_student_serial s ON s.`order_no` = o.`order_no` LEFT JOIN oa_employee e ON e.emp_id = r.recruit WHERE s.`serial_mark` = #{serialMark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY o.`order_no`

SELECT r.`recruit` AS empId, r.`recruit_dp_id` AS dpId, r.`recruit_campus_id` AS campusId, o.`mobile`, o.`std_id` as stdId FROM bd_learn_rules r INNER JOIN bd_student_order o ON o.`learn_id` = r.`learn_id` WHERE o.`order_no` = #{serialNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT r.`user_id` AS userId FROM bd_student_info r WHERE r.`std_id` = #{stdId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
